Intro: With my quick understanding and analytical mind, I have gained expertise in data management, particularly by designing reports and presentations that highlight relevant KPIs aligned with my clients’ needs. Dynamic, with excellent interpersonal skills, rigorous and thoughtful, I adapt easily to different environments and quickly understand what is expected of me.
DataVision: With specialized training in data intelligence, I design comprehensive data management and visualization solutions. From collection to analysis, through tool automation and the creation of interactive reports to support decision-making.
PMDesc: Managing complex projects with proven methodologies.
DataBlock1Item1: Understanding of data storage and manipulation systems
DataBlock1Item2: Strong Python development skills (This entire website was developed in Python using the Flask framework)
DataBlock1Item3: Workflow automation via scripts and task executors
DataBlock2Item2: Ability to clean and structure data
DataBlock2Item3: Mastery of ETL and ELT concepts and data flow architectures.
DataBlock3Item2: Organization of structured visuals to make data clear and targeted
DataBlock3Item3: Intuitive navigation and ease of dashboard interpretation
DataUseCase1Desc: Development of a Power BI dashboard connected via the Salesforce API for tracking key commercial performance indicators.
DataUseCase2Title:
Acxias (Mission for Pierre Fabre):
 Dataflow Automation between Internal Tool and Procurement Software
DataUseCase2Desc: Python RPA Selenium script to automate the import of correspondence tables into SAP Ariba
DataUseCase3Title:
Thémis Conseil (Mission for BNP Paribas):
 IT Project Budget Analysis within the Compliance Department
